net.codemusic.smartears.event
Interface SettingsListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
SettingsAdapter
public interface SettingsListener

An interface that should be implemented by classes wishing to tie into the Settings Event subsystem

Method Summary
 void delayChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Will be called when the delay value is modified
 void durationChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Will be called when the duration value is modified
 void instrumentChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Will be called when the istrument sound is changed
 void playModeChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Will be called when the play mode is changed
